statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_data;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM marketing_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, demographics FROM marketing_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM marketing_data WHERE customer_id > 50 AND customer_id < 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM marketing_data WHERE demographics ->> 'age' = '25' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_data WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM marketing_data WHERE demographics ->> 'age' > '30';
SELECT * FROM marketing_data WHERE demographics ->> 'gender' = 'Male' AND JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, demographics -> 'location' AS location FROM marketing_data WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(purchase_history) < 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;

SELECT customer_id, demographics -> 'income' AS income FROM marketing_data WHERE demographics ->> 'age' BETWEEN '25' AND '35' AND JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 10 ORDER BY customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT MAX(age) FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_data ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, age FROM customer_data WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchase_history WHERE price < 100;
SELECT campaign_id, clicks, revenue FROM campaign_results WHERE clicks > 100 AND revenue > 500;
SELECT * FROM customer_data;
SELECT customer_name, age, email FROM customer_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM customer_data INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer_data.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, clicks, conversions, revenue FROM marketing_campaigns INNER JOIN campaign_results ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_results.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 50000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_date, product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN products pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
